approvals.title: Cover v5 - Premium Redesign (White-Black-White Layout)
approvals.description: Premium covers with exact white-black-white color scheme and professional typography per Yaakov's feedback. Version A: Classic Business (serif title). Version B: Swiss Minimal (sans-serif focus). Both use proper premium fonts and clean layouts.

brandAlternatives.title: Pure Minimal (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Clean flat cream, gold accent line, navy block. Zero texture, pure Swiss design minimalism. Typography-led.

brandAlternatives.title: Subtle Geometric (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Faint intersecting lines in cream section (watermark effect). Gold accent, navy block. Premium stationery feel.

brandAlternatives.title: Soft Organic (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Natural paper grain texture, warm organic feel. Gold accent, navy block. Artisan premium quality.

completedItems.title: 5-Hour Implementation Sprint Complete
completedItems.description: Implemented all research findings: (1) Above-fold input layout optimization (2) Time-based activity level descriptions (3) Email capture foundation (4) Mobile optimization (5) SEO foundation. Live site updated, affiliate program applications ready to begin Monday.

completedItems.title: Build Protocol Skill â€” Complete

Includes: quality-scoped research, batched Q&A, PRD/Architecture templates, SUMMARY.md for context efficiency, diagnostic error recovery, user story verification. Trigger rules added to SOUL.md.

completedItems.title: Competitive Deep Dive Complete: UX + Traffic + Monetization
completedItems.description: Analyzed top calculators (Calculator.net, NerdWallet, Bankrate). Findings: (1) Inputs above fold critical for conversions. (2) Daily-life examples in activity levels improve self-identification. (3) Programmatic SEO drives 690k+/mo traffic (SmartAsset model). (4) Affiliate monetization = $379M/yr (NerdWallet). Email with actionable roadmap sent.

completedItems.title: Exercise Level Descriptions + Activity Quiz
completedItems.description: Implemented time-based descriptions (15-30 min Light, 30-45 min Moderate, 45-90 min Active, 2+ hours Extreme). Added ActivityGuide component with tabs, expanded descriptions, and optional activity quiz. Improves above-the-fold layout on desktop. Shipped in production.

completedItems.title: TDEE Calculator Deployed to Production
completedItems.description: 5 iterations complete. Live at https://main.tdee-calculator-8yb.pages.dev. Dark mode, CSV export, 23/23 tests, <1s load, 100% mobile responsive.

completedItems.title: Build Multi-Project Dashboard Layout
completedItems.description: Implemented project selector + project-scoped views. Master pulse tab aggregates all projects.

completedItems.title: ProjectCalc $100k Build Sprint Setup
completedItems.description: Initiated 3-day build sprint (Feb 6-8). Tech stack, design strategy, and build+research sub-agents launched.
